channel.title: music on BinaryDigit
channel.description: Recent content in music on BinaryDigit

item.title: VirtualDJ Software
item.description: Over the weekend I’ve been playing with VirtualDJ to mix music.

item.title: Tech Gear: FiiO M9 Media Player
item.description: I've been wanting to re-build my personal music library offline for a while now, for 2 reasons: 1) nostalgia for offline content that I don't have to rely on a streaming service for and 2) building up a library for DJ sets which ties into point number 1.

item.title: Photo Log - Detroit And Geekdom
item.description: Hitsville, USA When my parents and brother were in town, we did so much around Detroit and locally!

item.title: SoundCloud and YouTube
item.description: I went all in on a SoundCloud Next Pro subscription so that I can upload my stream sets; mainly record a seperate audio track without all of my talking, stream alerts, lowering of volumes etc, as well any any offline mixes I do.
